@owndscape wrote:

The only thing i see different is the 1 1 needs to be 2 2 and if your getting an error after that it is your spacng its tab between ammount and the next item ID, So it goes ItemId[space]amount[tab]Itemid] so on and so forth

PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 5;
}

item.title: Talk to opens shop
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

that is right now you just go into your shops.cfg and add shop 5 the title and the items that are in it that way i recognizes when you talk to that npc to open up the shop. Ex. shop = 5 Food potions and bones shop 2 2 537 50000 2437 500 2441 500 2443 500 2445 500 3041 500 2435 500 3025 500 380 5000

Read full topic

but it only works if i can trade them
